column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food: I love the short rib strogonoff
column2: in fact I love it so much that I always get the same thing! I also love the crab cake appetizer and oysters
column3: can't go wrong with them.  Their bread is amazing and their filet is so melt in your mouth tender. There isn't anything I've had or tasted that has not been delicious.  The service is always perfect too
column4: from the friendly front door hostess/hosts to the servers
